title: Abbay TV Launches New Morning News Program
description: Abbay TV proudly announces the launch of 'Ethiopian Morning', a comprehensive half-day news program covering the latest developments across Ethiopia. The program will air daily from 6 AM to 12 PM, featuring breaking news, in-depth analysis, weather updates, and interviews with key figures.
author: Abbay TV News Team

title: Ethiopia Signs New Trade Agreement
description: The Ethiopian government has signed a landmark trade agreement with Kenya, Sudan, and Djibouti to enhance regional economic cooperation.
author: Political Desk

title: Ethiopian Athletes Prepare for Championships
description: Ethiopian long-distance runners are intensifying their training ahead of the upcoming African Athletics Championships.
author: Sports Department

title: New Ethiopian Film Wins International Award
description: The Ethiopian movie 'እስከ መጨረሻው' has won the Best Foreign Language Film award at the Dubai International Film Festival.
author: Entertainment Desk
